titles.title: Margaret Chase Smith Foundation Grants Act of 1987
A bill to authorize the Secretary of Education to make grants to the Margaret Chase Smith Foundation.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education.

bill.summary: 12/14/1987--Introduced. Margaret Chase Smith Foundation Grants Act of 1987 - Authorizes the Secretary of Education to make grants to the Margaret Chase Smith Foundation, for the Margaret Chase Smith Library Center in Skowhegan, Maine. Authorizes appropriations.
